definition: back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc

pinyin: dai4 ban4 shi4 xiang4 lie4 biao3

sentences.english: To take charge of other assignments designated by the provincial government.
sentences.chinese: 承辦省政府交辦的其他事項。

sentences.english: Sets a specific day within the year on which this event or to-do should recur.
sentences.chinese: 此事件或待辦事項要於一年中的哪一天循環。

sentences.english: Attentions to using the column are also noted.
sentences.chinese: 提出了使用毛細管柱時應注意的事項。

sentences.english: An invitation for submission of bid shall clearly contain the particulars set forth in Paragraph 2 of Article 16 of this Law.
sentences.chinese: 投標邀請書應當載明本法第十六條第二款規定的事項。

sentences.english: Double-entry-accounting: A system of recording every business transaction with equal dollar amounts of both debit and credit entries.
sentences.chinese: 在借方和貸方用相等的金額記錄經濟事項的記賬系統。

sentences.english: The running of ais water antiflushing filter and common points for attention in it are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了氣水反衝洗濾池的運行操作和一般注意事項。

sentences.english: Please read the Notes before Application before filling out this application form.
sentences.chinese: 填寫報名表前，請先詳讀招生簡章上的報名注意事項。

sentences.english: If you want to lose weight, here are some dos and don'ts.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想減輕體重，這是一些注意事項。

sentences.english: I know these matters are important to you.
sentences.chinese: 我知道這些事項對你們來說很重要。

sentences.english: To undertake other assignments designated by provincial government.
sentences.chinese: 承辦省政府交辦的其他事項。

sentences.english: To undertake other assignments designated by the autonomous region government.
sentences.chinese: 承辦自治區人民政府交辦的其他事項。

sentences.english: But before you grab the CDs, hear this note of caution.
sentences.chinese: 但在你抓取CD之前，聽一下注意事項。

sentences.english: Month End and Year End Processing matters.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解月底及年底關賬需懂事項。

sentences.english: Other amendments as specified by the financial supervision and regulation department.
sentences.chinese: 金融監督管理部門規定的其他變更事項。

sentences.english: Financial planers help individuals and businesses organize their financial affairs .
sentences.chinese: 理財師幫助個人和企業組織他們的財務事項。

sentences.english: To undertake other works assigned by the prefectural commission and government.
sentences.chinese: 承辦州政府交辦的其他事項。

definition: to restrict/to agree to a contract/offer/bid
